author: Staff Reporter
text:
Revenue division level special grievance day for the differently abled is to be held here on Friday.

At division level

District Collector A. Gnanasekaran has accepted the demand of Tamil Nadu Association for the Rights of All Types of Differently Abled and Caregivers (TARATDAC) to conduct the monthly special grievance redressal meet for differently abled at the division level.

Waiting agitation

TARATDAC staged a waiting agitation in the Collectorate insisting this demand apart from other two on January 5.

Tiruvannamalai Revenue Divsional Officer, R. Uma Maheswari would conduct the grievance meet at 11 a.m. on Friday.
title: Special grievance day tomorrow for differently abled
